```{r echo=FALSE}
all_data_continuous <- read_csv("./combined_with_percent_highlighted.csv")
```

```{r}
model_continuous = lmer(percent_highlighted ~ 1 + word + sadness + joy + concreteness + neutral + anger + neutral.1 + norm_dt + IA_REGRESSION_PATH_DURATION + IA_AVERAGE_FIX_PUPIL_SIZE + (1 | RECORDING_SESSION_LABEL) + (1 | story), data=all_data_continuous)
```

```{r}
summary(model_continuous)
```

```{r}
coef(model_continuous)
```
